description:
Always Discreet Pants lets you continue with your day with bladder leak incontinence protection that gives you coverage even when you experience large amounts of leakage. It has a smooth and secure fit that looks and feels like real underwear. It has 3-in-1 dryness, comfort and odour control with a Rapid Dry core that protects against leaks by locking in liquid and turning it into gel. With Always Discreet Bladder Leak Incontinence Underwear, you can walk confidently while wearing discreet, amazing protection. Always Discreet Pants come in Medium (AU: 10-16) and Large (AU: 16-22) sizes.

Absorbs leaks in seconds

With 360 Form Fit

With a Rapid Dry Triple Lock core that turns liquid to gel

Built with Odour Control that starts to neutralize odours instantly and continuously

Offers secure protection you can barely feel

With double protective leak guards to help keep wetness away from the edges

Contains different feminine designs

Lightly Scented.Dermatologically tested.
name: Always Discreet Incontinence Underwear Super Night Pant M 9 Pack
